# DateIntervalFormatter.Style.none

**Case**

No information for the date or time. Use this style when you do not want to include date or time information in the resulting string.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Constants

- **DateIntervalFormatter.Style.short**: An abbreviated date or time format.
- **DateIntervalFormatter.Style.medium**: A medium length date or time format.
- **DateIntervalFormatter.Style.long**: A long length date or time format.
- **DateIntervalFormatter.Style.full**: A fully spelled out date or time format.
